divs: Sighting Details1 just got out of my pool in my back yard2 lights flying in the sky3 first thought it was just an airplan but then I was sure it was not a plan4 during the sighting I just watched the object, after the sighting i have foundit difficult to sleep.5 flew in a stright line north with flashing lights, then the ufo hovered andthen picked up speed and started to fly stright up into the air. The ufo thenstarted heading south. After heading south the ufo started heading north agiantowords the ground but then leved out in a striaght line heading north. The ufoout out a bright white light for about three seconds.6 flew behind some houses.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in St Thomas
There were no other sightings in St Thomas on or around July 16th 2003
